entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as someone who was under attack and saw Harry hit by the Killing Curse.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who questioned Bill's account of what he saw.

entities.name: mad eye
entities.description: Mad Eye is mentioned as someone who fell about a thousand feet even if the Killing Curse missed him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who weighed Quidditch Teams of Britain and Ireland in her hand and expressed shock at Mad Eye's death.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone whose body was broken like Mad Eye's.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as someone who said Mad Eye's wand was blasted out of his hand.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are mentioned as people who probably tidied up after themselves.

relationships.description: Bill saw Harry hit by the Killing Curse.
Ron questioned Bill's account of what he saw regarding Mad Eye.
Hermione expressed shock at Mad Eye's death.
Fleur reported that Mad Eye's wand was blasted out of his hand.
Death Eaters probably tidied up after themselves regarding Mad Eye's body.
